title: What are some K-pop songs that you used to like but dislike them now? - Quora

response.answer_text: I used to like pretty much every BLACKPINK song. But after a while, it got boring. KTL was a complete let down and I think that was just a downwards spiral for me from then on. I dislike BLACKPINK in general nowadays because I feel like they’re no longer Kpop idols. And looking back on the songs I did like, I think to myself how generic they all sound. They literally sound like any other pop song and they all have the same aura, the same choreography’s and everything. I don’t hate BLACKPINK, they are ultimately more successful than I’ll ever be and I have nothing but respect for them. However in my opinion, I’m confused to why they still have a fan base. Aren’t blinks bored? It’s nearly been a year since they released their last album like it has been for the past 3 years (Though should it really be classed as an album if there’s only 5 songs?). You guys are literally getting 1 comeback a year. I feel bad lmao.
